ComicInfo.Title: Ka-Pow!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Across the globe, word of Ken's fate spreads to the other Street Fighters. While their relationships and attitudes to Ken vary, their reaction does not, as each is angered and promises retribution upon Ken's attackers for what they have done.
Meanwhile, E. Honda encounters the Malibu superhero the Ferret, and challenges him to a friendly match as practice before setting out to avenge Ken, and Bison drives Sagat into further battles to hone his ferocity and keep him from succumbing to guilt.
And in Ryu & Ken's old training grounds, their master Sheng Long, who has been poisoned, is cared for by a mysterious woman named Nida, a woman who seems to bear Ryu a grudge.
The series was cancelled with this issue as Capcom was unhappy with Malibu's adaptation. As a bonus, the book's creators outline the future plans that they had for each of the characters in the series.
